name: Blastard!
description:
A somewhat frustrating bubble shooter that will excercise your brain cells.

The game switches between three different mechanics:

1 - Shoot arrows with the buttons Q (blue arrow), W (orange) and E (green).

2 - Shoot bubbles, match three with the same color. Same buttons and colors.

3 - Shoot arrows with button Q, move with button W and shot bubbles with button E. The cannon decide wich color you're shooting.

Clear all the bubbles to finish the level. Then the room starts over but it's slightly harder. There's totally 8 levels.

This is my first game I ever publish! It was made in a week for the Summer Slow Jam 2019: 3-button, 3-color game jam with theme "One more time".
